outcome.context: I have always enjoyed working with dashboards and data management. I previously used Power BI and Excel for this purpose, but wanted to go beyond ready-made tools. I used real household expenses as a real-world scenario to build a fully coded solution.
outcome.solution: I developed a fullstack application focused on financial data visualization and management, building custom dashboard components without relying on UI libraries. The solution was designed for clarity, reusability, and performance.
outcome.result: After publishing the demo, I allowed family members to use the system in their daily routine and collect real user feedback. This led to improvements in UX, data organization, and application flow.
